price: Yari kuguma mu nda yayo kugeza ku munsi (abantu) bazazurirwaho.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
